AppListManager is easy to use Android library, which minimizes developing time when working on application or activity lists.

SABS was a system-wide, rootless AdBlocker, package disabler, permission manager with more than 100,000 downloads.

Twelveish is a unique Wear OS (Android Wear) Watch Face that displays the approximate time in words (in multiple languages).
